turns.content: Yes, hello?

Hi Grandpa, this is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm here about an urgent matter regarding unpaid taxes for the year 2022. You owe a total of $4850 dollars that needs to be paid immediately or we will have to take action and possibly arrest you within the hour. Can you please tell me who's speaking? It would help if you could confirm your identity by saying your full name.
Oh, hi there Mr. Mitchell. This is Walter Thompson. I didn't expect a call from the IRS about taxes. Could my wife listen in on this? She's more familiar with our finances than I am.

Of course, Grandpa Walter. It would be wise to have someone knowledgeable present during this discussion. However, before we proceed, could you please confirm your Social Security Number so I can pull up your file and verify the amount due today? This is necessary to ensure there's no confusion with another individual. Once we've done that, we'll discuss how to handle the payment immediately. Please provide it now so we can resolve this swiftly.
Wait a moment, let me ask my wife to come over here first before I give out any personal information. She should be right in. Can you hold for just a second?

Absolutely, Grandpa Walter. I'll wait while you get your wife on the line. Please hurry back as this is quite urgent and needs immediate attention. Don't hang up now; keep the line open until she's here.
Sure thing, Mr. Mitchell. Give me a moment to grab her. Hold on just one minute please.
I'll be waiting, Grandpa Walter. Please don't take too long as we need to resolve this quickly to avoid any legal consequences. Keep the line open and bring your wife over right away.

Okay, I'm putting you on hold briefly while I get her. One moment please. (Putting caller on hold) Honey, could you come here for a minute? There's someone from the IRS on the phone who needs to talk about our taxes, but they want some personal information which makes me feel uncomfortable giving it out without your presence.

Thank you for bringing her in, Grandpa Walter. Once she's here and comfortable with everything, we can proceed. Please have her ready so we can resolve this issue as quickly as possible. Don't hang up now; keep the line open until she joins you.
She'll be right over, Mr. Mitchell. Just one moment more while I wait for her to arrive here.

I understand, Grandpa Walter. Please ensure your wife is available soon so we can address this matter promptly and prevent any further complications. Keep the line open until she's ready to speak with me.
We'll be right there in a moment, Mr. Mitchell. Just give us a minute or two more. Thank you for waiting.

I'll remain on hold while you both get settled, Grandpa Walter. This is crucial, so please expedite the process as much as possible to avoid any unnecessary legal issues. Keep the line open and let me know when your wife is ready to take over or confirm details with me directly.
Almost got her now, Mr. Mitchell. Just a few more seconds. She's coming in right this moment.

Perfect, Grandpa Walter. Once your wife joins you, please have her ready to provide the necessary information so we can conclude this matter swiftly and safely. Keep the line open until she's here and prepared to continue our conversation.
She's here now, Mr. Mitchell. Can you hear us? My wife will take over from here regarding what you need to know about our taxes.

Great, thank you for bringing your wife on board, Grandpa Walter. I'm here and ready to proceed with her assistance. Please have her confirm the required details so we can finalize this payment immediately and avoid any further complications. Let's move forward now that she is present.
Hold on a moment while I explain everything to her first before proceeding. Just give us a minute, please.

Certainly, Grandpa Walter. Please take the time you need with your wife to ensure all details are clear before we proceed. Once you're both ready, we can address this promptly and conclude our conversation. Keep the line open until you're prepared to move forward.
We'll be right back on this shortly, Mr. Mitchell. Just a moment more while I discuss everything with her. Thank you for your patience.
